idea-plugin.name: AI-Powered Jira Integration for Test Automation
idea-plugin.description:
AI-Powered Jira Integration for Test Automation Failures

Streamline your QA workflow by automatically creating Jira tickets from failed test cases with AI-powered descriptions and root cause analysis.

Key Features:

  • 🔍 Automatic Test Failure Detection - Monitors Rest Assured and other test frameworks
  • 🤖 AI-Generated Bug Reports - Smart descriptions with probable root cause analysis
  • 🎫 One-Click Jira Integration - Create tickets directly from IntelliJ
  • 📊 Test Tracking - Link test cases to Jira tickets for comprehensive tracking
  • 🔔 Smart Notifications - Get notified of new failures and ticket creation

Supported Test Frameworks:

  • Rest Assured
  • JUnit 4/5
  • TestNG
  • Spock
